channel.title: SitScape-Pk 317 PI Spawn/PK
channel.description:
Hello. Welcome to the SitScape-Pk 317 Spawn/PK development thread.
Server Base : OverloadX
what I've Done: -Made funpk -Vote point shop -PK point shop -Donator point shop -added some custom items -Dclaws now hit more often (before they were very weak) -added spawnable kits to the achievement tab -added killstreak system with PKP reward according to your streak -Fixed lunar magics -added ::getid command -added donator ticket and empty ticket (use empty ticket to take donator status off your account and make a tradable donator ticket) -added Special attack restore potions (1 dose refills 50% spec) costs 5 pkp -chaotics are now PKP items -PKP items and valuable items (non spawnable) will protect over anything (the more expensive ones protect over the ones that aren't as good) -Made prices decent in the PKP shop -At the duel arena, instead of fun weapons you can make it so you can only use whip/dds -3 Pkp per kill instead of 4 -Double pkp days added -chillzone -rocktails now heal over max hp. -::commands sais the commands -click on a stat on the stat sidebar and enter the level you want it to be
NEW : Just added statuettes and ancient artefacts as pvp drops, claim them to get PKPoints!
Media/Pictures [spoiler] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Uc0e5EO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UzteUMH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YhUR1Tt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lvcQGDE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/imTvRIM.png[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: SitScape-Pk 317 PI Spawn/PK
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

Hello. Welcome to the SitScape-Pk 317 Spawn/PK development thread.

Server Base : OverloadX

what I’ve Done:
-Made funpk
-Vote point shop
-PK point shop
-Donator point shop
-added some custom items
-Dclaws now hit more often (before they were very weak)
-added spawnable kits to the achievement tab
-added killstreak system with PKP reward according to your streak
-Fixed lunar magics
-added ::getid command
-added donator ticket and empty ticket (use empty ticket to take donator status off your account and make a tradable donator ticket)
-added Special attack restore potions (1 dose refills 50% spec) costs 5 pkp
-chaotics are now PKP items
-PKP items and valuable items (non spawnable) will protect over anything (the more expensive ones protect over the ones that aren’t as good)
-Made prices decent in the PKP shop
-At the duel arena, instead of fun weapons you can make it so you can only use whip/dds
-3 Pkp per kill instead of 4
-Double pkp days added
-chillzone
-rocktails now heal over max hp.
-::commands sais the commands
-click on a stat on the stat sidebar and enter the level you want it to be

NEW :
Just added statuettes and ancient artefacts as pvp drops, claim them to get PKPoints!

Media/Pictures
[spoiler]





[/spoiler]

Read full topic
